rgpd.title: Protecting your data
sections: How do we use your data?
details: We collect personal data when you use our services.
We use your data to personalize your experience.
You have the right to access, modify, and delete your personal data.
If you have any questions, contact us via our form.

vitrine.title: Showcase Websites
vitrine.description: A showcase website highlights a company's essential information, easy to navigate.

details.title: Features
details.description: Highlights key information, no e-commerce functionality.

details.title: Objective
details.description: Strengthen online presence and facilitate contact.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Websites
ecommerce.description: Create an online store with secure payment options and optimized stock management.

details.title: Features
details.description: Online store, real-time payment and stock management.

details.title: Objective
details.description: Facilitate online sales and provide an optimized user experience.

seo.title: SEO Optimization
seo.description: Optimize your site to rank well on Google and increase visibility.

details.title: Features
details.description: Keyword optimization and site speed improvement.

details.title: Objective
details.description: Increase visibility on search engines and generate qualified traffic.

hosting.title: Secure Hosting
hosting.description: Ensure your site's security with robust hosting and regular backups.

details.title: Features
details.description: Data protection and hosting with frequent backups.

maintenance.title: Management and Maintenance
maintenance.description: Continuous updates and technical support to keep your site running perfectly.

details.title: Features
details.description: Regular maintenance, updates, and technical support.

details.title: Objective
details.description: Ensure proper functioning and site security.

details: Created in 2025, our company is committed to supporting businesses in their digital transformation with modern, aesthetic, and high-performance web solutions.

Our mission is clear:

- Provide tailor-made websites, both beautiful and functional.
- Help our clients grow their online visibility and reputation.
- Simplify the creation and management of their online presence with suitable tools.

Our values are at the heart of everything we do:

- Innovation: We use modern technologies to offer sustainable and scalable solutions.
- Proximity: We work closely with our clients to understand their needs and exceed their expectations.
- Excellence: We are committed to delivering high-quality projects on time.

We aim to become a key partner for businesses looking to stand out online.

In the coming years, we want to:

- Collaborate with a broader network of clients in various sectors.
- Offer innovative services to anticipate new market expectations.
- Continue to provide impeccable customer service.

Since our creation, we have proven ourselves by supporting ambitious businesses in their digital projects. Hereâ€™s why our clients trust us:

- A personalized approach: Each project is unique, and we take the time to understand your needs.
- Modern and high-performance solutions: We use the latest technologies to ensure the quality and longevity of your sites.
- Comprehensive support: From the initial idea to going live, we guide you every step of the way.

carousel.slide1: Professional showcase websites for your business.
carousel.slide2: Launch your online store with a powerful and secure e-commerce site.
carousel.slide3: Create the website of your dreams with AeoniX.

etapes.title: Your turnkey website
details: We will start with a discussion to understand your expectations and goals. This essential step will allow us to lay the foundation for a site that perfectly meets your needs.

Based on your ideas, we create mockups or detailed plans, accompanied by a tailor-made proposal. You will have a clear vision of the future site and can approve its design before moving to development.

Once the mockup is approved, we carefully develop your site, integrating each feature according to your needs. Each step is thoroughly tested to ensure a high-performance result that meets your expectations.
Once your site is finalized, we put it online and ensure that it is fully functional, ready to offer the best experience to your visitors.
After going live, we stay by your side for personalized follow-up. We assist you in the evolution of your site, performing updates, adjustments, or meeting your changing needs.
